Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Hollywood Roosevelt places you in the heart of Hollywood, steps from TCL Chinese Theatre and Dolby Theater. This 4-star hotel is close to Hollywood Bowl and Hollywood Walk of Fame.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 300 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages and body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Hollywood? This hotel has 25000 square feet (2323 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hollywood Wax Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Grauman's Egyptian Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Hollywood Bowl - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hollywood and Vine - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Capitol Records Tower - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Hollywood Walk of Fame - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Pantages Theatre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Hollywood Palladium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
The Groundlings - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Runyon Canyon Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope) - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for The Hollywood Roosevelt is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hollywood Roosevelt are:
Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope) - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hollywood Roosevelt is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

A non-refundable cleaning fee of USD 100 will be charged - good for 7 days and thereafter will be charged again weekly.,Pets are not permitted in Cabana Rooms or Floors 11 and 12.,Please note:Hotel requires a security deposit that will be refunded upon check out.Pet Policy: 100 USD non-refundable fee per room for cleaning. Good for 7 days; after 7 days, fee will be recharged. No pets allowed in the cabanas or on floors eleven and twelve.WiFi cost is USD 14.99 for 24 hours for 5mb of WiFi for up to 3 devices.The property pool is one of the most lively parts of the hotel. Be aware during the summer months through September 7th that live music is played during the day and evening Friday through Saturday and official hosted pool parties occur Sundays from 14:00 to 18:00, as well as our Night Swim on Tuesday evenings from 20:00 to 02:00.Reservations of 9 or more rooms will be subject to different policies and deposit. Please contact the property for more details. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
